metadata.name: MAHATMA
metadata.description:
My genesis standalone piece on foundation dedicated to the Father of our nation who employed non-violent resistance to lead the successful campaign for India's Independence. Alongside some of the national symbols  in my style . I purposefully hid few of them for the art admirer to find out.
The artwork also consists infamous monkeys which are not so bored apes (pun) and Charaka which was a symbol of swadeshi movement.
The artwork also describes the current situation of the world where there is more Chaos and War than Peace in a  subtle way. 
This artwork took almost a month to finish and done with Procreate.
